description: Transform the joy of a toffee apple into cake with this dessert. Apple and vanilla cake topped with cream cheese frosting, walnuts and caramel drizzle.
name: Toffee Apple Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 385 g canned apple slices pie fruit

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, using an electric mixer, beat cream cheese and icing sugar until smooth and combined. Spread frosting over cake top. Cut into 16 pieces, then drizzle with caramel sauce and sprinkle with walnuts. Serve.
